title: Crystal Glass calibration: numeric-only bloom and emissiveIntensity adjustments

requirements.text: In CubeVisualization.tsx, update only the following numeric values in the Bloom post-processing pass: set intensity to 0.15, set radius to 0.5, set luminanceThreshold to 0.1. Do NOT modify smoothing, any other Bloom properties, any other post-processing passes, or any other logic or structure in the file.

quotes: In CubeVisualisation.tsx (Bloom settings): Set intensity to 0.15, Set radius to 0.5, Set luminanceThreshold to 0.1, Do NOT touch smoothing or any other post-processing passes

acceptanceCriteria: All other Bloom properties (e.g., smoothing) remain unchanged
No other post-processing passes are modified
No logic, structure, metalness, or roughness settings are changed

requirements.text: In LandModel.tsx, within the biomeConfigs block, change emissiveIntensity from 1.5 to 1.0 for every biome entry. Do NOT change the pulse value (keep it at 0.15), do NOT modify any other material properties, and do NOT touch any geometry logic or structure.

quotes: In LandModel.tsx (biomeConfigs block): Change emissiveIntensity from 1.5 to 1.0 for ALL biomes. Keep the pulse at 0.15 as previously set. Do NOT touch any other material properties or geometry logic.

acceptanceCriteria: Every biome entry in biomeConfigs has emissiveIntensity set to exactly 1.0
No biome entry retains the old value of 1.5
Pulse value remains at 0.15 for all biomes
No other material properties (metalness, roughness, envMapIntensity, etc.) are altered
No geometry logic or structural code is changed
